name: uu-app-binarystore/getBinaryData
description:
#### uuCmd documentation
https://uuapp.plus4u.net/uu-bookkit-maing01/34df77ebe0a04adda6dcd62d32c4f513/book/page?code=getBinaryData_00

#### Input
```javascript
{ 
  code: "...", //identifier of the binary (all versions of binary have same code)
  contentDisposition: "..." //style of returned binary data; possible values: ["inline", "attachment"]; default value "attachment"  
};
```
#### Validation schema
```javascript
shape({
  code: code().isRequired(),
  contentDisposition: oneOf(["inline","attachment"])
})
```
#### Output
 Returns a binary data stream.
